hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.presentenceinvestigation.report.PresentenceInvestigationRequestSummary( psir.id, offender.id, psir.requestDate, personName.firstName, personName.lastName, userAccount.username, psir.expectedCompletionDate, offenderName.firstName, offenderName.lastName, offenderName.middleName, offender.offenderNumber, psir.sentenceDate, category.name, (select count(*) from omis.presentenceinvestigation.domain.PresentenceInvestigationTaskAssociation pita2 inner join pita2.task task where pita2.presentenceInvestigationRequest = psir and task.completionDate is not null ), (select count(*) from omis.presentenceinvestigation.domain.PresentenceInvestigationTaskGroup pitg, omis.task.domain.TaskTemplate tt where pitg.presentenceInvestigationCategory = category and pitg.group = tt.group), psir.submissionDate, (select count(*) from omis.presentenceinvestigation.domain.PresentenceInvestigationDelay delay where delay.presentenceInvestigationRequest = psir)) from omis.presentenceinvestigation.domain.PresentenceInvestigationRequest psir inner join psir.category category inner join psir.person offender inner join psir.assignedUser userAccount inner join userAccount.user user left outer join user.name personName left outer join offender.name offenderName where userAccount = :assignedUser and psir.submissionDate is not null
